traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Celestial Resistance
traits.desc: You have resistance to necrotic damage and radiant damage.

traits.name: Draconic Ancestry
traits.desc: You have a draconic ancestry that determines your damage resistance and breath weapon.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.desc: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. The type of damage depends on your draconic ancestry.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.desc: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Skill Versatility
traits.desc: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

traits.name: Lucky
traits.desc: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Adreline rush
traits.desc: You can take the dash action as a bonus action on your turn. When you do so, you gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses after a short rest or long rest.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.desc: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Hellish Resistance
traits.desc: You have resistance to fire damage.
